title: Pudding Party!
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Maki-san, do you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>About what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That today is Pudding Day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmm, is that so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>So umm, there’s something I’d like to ask you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>About how you want to throw a pudding party?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>H-, how did you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, you seemed to have really enjoyed yourself at the shortcake party the other day, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Was I that excited....? How embarrassing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Fufu, I just mean that I’m happy to see you having fun, Shioriko. I think a pudding party is a great idea. Let’s do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
